      Queries the TBL_BOOKS and TBL_BOOKCOPIES tables to calculate the time users have left for a particular checkout
      int daysUntilReturn(java.lang.String ISBN)
      Scans through all the copies of a given ISBN that are not overdue, and will determine the least number of days until return If a copy of the book is available, it will return 0

      • daysUntilReturn

        public int daysUntilReturn(java.lang.String ISBN)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Scans through all the copies of a given ISBN that are not overdue, and will determine the least number of days until return If a copy of the book is available, it will return 0

        Returns:
        The amount of days until the book is expected to be returned in circulation.
